Journal Story: just got my 60lb weight vest....walked around the house for 10 minutes and it brought back flashbacks on how I felt when I use to weigh 250....heart racing and out of breath......man I am out of shape!......well here goes my beginning journey of preparation and getting in shape for my hike.
I have been doing so much gear research that I don't know even where to begin.
I bought a charging pack for my iphone...so I can charge my phone while on the trail...I testing it now...will keep you posted.
